name: PlayCez Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description: Provider of a local event discovery platform. The company's platform monitors social media and location check-in activity in an area and recommends popular events and activities to users by identifying locations like bars, restaurants, night clubs, among others in that area.
one_liner: Provider of a local event discovery platform. The company's platform monitors social media and location check-in activity in an area and recommends popular events and activities to users by identifying locations like bars, restaurants, night clubs, among others in that area.
